experience: You and Rebecca both know Wayne Neale, Dimitri Ponomareff, and 17 others
Rebecca can introduce you to 7 people at General Dynamics Mission Systems
Rebecca worked at General Dynamics Mission Systems

Software Quality Analyst for newly developed QA department for this used car retailer and finance company. •	Interview , onboard, and mentor new QA Analysts•	Write test plans and test scripts throughout the development lifecycle (Kanban and new Scrum Agile process)•	Introduced best practice documents for writing test cases, defects, naming conventions for test scripts, document versioning. Introduced a number of templates including Test Plan artifacts to the team.  •	Lead, plan, schedule, and perform manual software testing for assigned applications•	Trained off-shore manual tester for 24 x 7 test execution coverage•	Work closely with software developers to perform early exploratory testing on components prior to integration builds•	Web-based browser testing for desktop and mobile devices•	Some API testing using swagger.  Used Knockout js for inspection of components.

Project Analyst at Wells Fargo, Corporate Technology & Consumer Lending Division; Access Management Solutions: Fraud, Audit, Credit, Physical Security, & Risk Operations Systems.•	Responsible for ensuring release and testing functions are professionally planned, adequately resourced and efficient. Produce test strategies to monitor testing is accurate in relation to the delivery of software releases, defect repairs, and developments into various environments.  •	Maintain test documentation, reports, and internal use User Guides.•	Report metrics of test progress for each cycle of testing.  •	Created entirely new folder structure in hp Quality Center ALM for this project to include Knowledge Transfer, Data Set-Up, End-to-End Testing, and Learning Modules.•	Hold regular defect review meetings with multi-functional team.•	Perform gap analysis and solution offerings.
Solu Technology Partners - Western Heritage Insurance Company

Test analyst at Western Heritage Insurance Company; a Scottsdale Insurance Co.  Division transitioned from an SDLC of waterfall to a Scrum Agile methodology for its rate to issue application.  Accomplishments:•	Created test team SharePoint documentation: defect tracking, helpful links & sites, insurance acronyms and glossary, forms & templates, and requirements traceability.  Introduced, wrote, and trained testers on Quality Center ALM test standards and best practices.•	Created complete folder structure in Quality Center ALM for current application and other applications the team supports.•	Manual software testing of rate to issue application features for multiple lines of insurance; property, general liability, inland marine, garage liability.•	Key contributor on team as temporary Test Lead.

Lead business process test analyst and manual tester in fast-paced environment for projects utilizing Agile SCRUM and waterfall SDLC methodologies.  Responsible for test planning and execution for .NET and JAVA web applications integrated with SalesForce as a high visibility internal platform.  Developed and implemented standardization across multiple ALM projects.  Perform test reviews and extensive requirements analysis.	Regression and negative testing  	UI and compatibility testing	Data interface & migration testing	Functional and UI design requirements review	Test plans, cases, processes	QA & QC standards documentation

summary: Energetic, innovative leader offering extensive experience in the areas of Quality Assurance, Software Testing, and Business/Systems Analysis. Over fifteen years experience in the software industry with a keen interest in Human Centered Design and User Experience. Outstanding professional who takes great pride in her solid track record of technical leadership. Recognized for teamwork, integrity, commitment and the ability to consistently meet and exceed performance objectives.
